WeaponType.description: The type of weapon the egg pawn has.

SearchDistance.description: How far this object can see when searching for a player to attack.

SearchAngle.description: The angle at which the egg pawn searches for players to attack.

MoveDistance.description: How far this object can move.

ShotCoolDown.description: Whether or not the egg pawn waits in-between shooting.

AttackConst.description: Whether this enemy will attack the player constantly?

In3D.description: Whether this object is in a 3D section, or a 2D section.

IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.

HasGravity.description: Whether this object is affected by gravity.

IsFallStart.description: Whether this object spawns in its falling state.

IsTreadGrass.description: Whether this object is walking through grass?

UpdateMaterial.description: Whether this object's material needs to be updated each frame?

IsStatic.description: Whether this egg pawn never moves?

ToSVPathDistance.description: How far away this egg pawn is from a 2D section?

Extra.value: Egg Pawns could not be a better name to describe how these guys are in Forces.
